sect2.title: Export File Formats
sect2.para: When exporting an image, most file formats have additional options that can be set. If that is the case, a new dialog opens after you have selected the filename and export file format. The following pages document the dialogs for export file formats in alphabetical order.

Be aware that not all formats support all kinds of images. In particular certain formats may not be able to show transparency (like jpeg), while only a few formats support exporting an animation (like webp and gif).
